org.mockito

Interface BDDMockito.Then<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the mock
    Enclosing class:
    BDDMockito

    public static interface BDDMockito.Then<T>
    Provides fluent way of mock verification.
    Since:
    1.10.5
